tools.name: Reverse Prompt Generator
tools.description: Reconstructs the closest possible original prompt from an image, text output, or generated content.
tools.optimized_prompt: Given an image or output, generate the most accurate possible reconstruction of the original prompt. Identify subjects, style, lighting, composition, colors, mood, camera details, and special effects. Provide a clean, single-line prompt optimized for text-to-image models.

tools.name: Prompt Optimizer
tools.description: Enhances a rough user prompt into a clean, detailed, and model-optimized version while preserving the original intent.
tools.optimized_prompt: Take the user prompt and optimize it for clarity, detail, and output quality. Enhance structure, add missing technical details, and ensure the final prompt is concise, high-impact, and model-friendly.

tools.name: Style Extractor
tools.description: Extracts the artistic style, visual identity, and rendering characteristics from an image or text prompt.
tools.optimized_prompt: Analyze the given image or text and extract its visual style, including color palette, rendering method, medium, textures, mood, and artistic influences. Output a reusable style signature block that can be applied to new prompts.
